name: Cactus Capers
description:
A retro-style game about shooting, growing and defending your desert, made for the 36th GM48 Game Jam

Your desert is under attack! Take control of the sentient Cactus that defends these sands, save the day against the horrible beasties using weapons you plant yourself and watch grow from seedlings. Juggle your seeds, ammo and water as you fight off the hoards of bugs and beasties out to get you!

This game was made in 48 hours for the 36th GM48 Game Jam

Check out the original Version 1.0 on GM48 here: https://gm48.net/game/1740/cactus-capers
